Title: Silverlight Browser
Description: Silverlight 3 has some great new features like the out of browser experience and the navigation framework. However there is a gap between the two in that users can't browse when running out of the browser. This project attempts to bridge the gap.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Silverlight 3 has some great new features like the out of browser experience and the navigation framework. However there is a gap between the two in that users can't browse when running out of the browser. This project attempts to bridge the gap.

To find out more about this project you can follow it on my blog.
